content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before starting operations.
- Ensure that boilers have fuel to generate steam for the steam engine.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Connect the steam engine to the power grid to provide electricity.
- Ensure that pipe groups are connected to entities that require fluids.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients or source items
- Provide ingredients for stone furnaces to smelt.
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to insert.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
